text: @realDonaldTrump Seriously.  Rome is burning and you want to make sure the public knows WE won’t pay for security for the royal couple.  Focus man.  Focus.  #2020Elections #25AmendmentNow #AndrewCuomo #BoycottTrumpPressConferences #CountryOverParty #COVID19
